= |blank4_info = |blank5_name = |blank5_info = |blank6_name = |blank6_info = |website = |footnotes = }} Gao was the capital of the Songhai Empire. Other important cities in the empire were Timbuktu and Djenn√©, conquered in 1468 and 1475 respectively. Trade flourished in those towns. ==References== == Other websites == Category:Cities in Mali
